The Rivers and Beacon-hills of Gondor

wikitext.*:
'''WATH''' is an [[Elvish]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "shade".<ref name=Ety397>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 397; cf. {{VT|46a}}, p. 21</ref>

==Derivatives==

*[[Primitive Quendian]]: ''[[aw'tha]]''<ref name=VT42/>
**[[Quenya]]: ''[[ausa|auþa, ausa]]''<ref name=VT42/>
**[[Sindarin]]: ''[[auth]]''<ref name=VT42/>
*[[Quenya]]: ''waþar, [[vasar]]'' ("a veil"); ''[[Vasarya|vasarya-]]'' ("to veil")<ref name=VT42/>
*[[Kornoldorin|Old Noldorin]] ([[Old Sindarin]]): ''watha''<ref name=Ety397/>
*[[Sindarin]]: ''[[gwath]]''; ''gwathra-'' ("overshadow, dim, veil, obscure"); ''[[gwathren]]''; ''[[gwathui]]'';<ref name=VT42>{{VT|42a}}, pp. 9-10</ref>
*[[Ilkorin]]: ''[[gwath]]''<ref name=Ety397/>

{{references}}
